TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ColumnProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a base class for column providers.

span.span: Provides a base class for column providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列提供程序必须扩展此类。Column providers must extend this class. 类和 ADO.NET Entity Framework 类都可以扩展此类的提供程序。The class and the ADO.NET Entity Framework class are providers that extend this class.

Adds default attributes.
The attribute collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`attributes`参数不包含集合，但模型提供程序要求此属性，添加对象。If the `attributes` parameter does not contain the collection, but the model provider requires this attribute, the object is added. 如果`attributes`参数不包含集合和的列，表示此提供程序是一个字符串，添加对象。If the `attributes` parameter does not contain the collection and the column that is represented by this provider is a string, the object is added.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context.

value.span: 如果列是不是模型的数据上下文; 中的其他属性否则为。

span.span: if the column is an additional property that is not in the model's data context; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将不在数据上下文通常来自于一个视图或计算的属性的列。Columns that are not in the data context typically come from a view or calculated property. 值属性可以用于确定是否支持如排序的列操作。The value of the property can be used to determine whether column operations such as sorting are supported. 例如，实现接口的数据模型将不支持对返回的属性排序`true`为属性，因为数据库中不存在列。For example, the implementation of the interface of the data model will not support sorting on properties that return `true` for the property, because the column does not exist in the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为强类型化的实体引用列的表实体 （数据模型中的表对象） 的成员未设置此属性。This property is not set for strongly typed entity reference columns that are members of the table entity (a table object in the data model).
